text: Scream VI (also informally known as Scream 6) is a comedy of horror slasher movie. It was directed by Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillett. It written by James Vanderbilt and Guy Busick This is the first movie in the franchise to not feature Neve Campbell (who played Sidney Prescott in the previous Scream movies) and David Arquette (who played Dewey Riley in the previous Scream movies). Scream VI was released in March 10, 2023. == Cast == Category:American horror movies Category:Scream movies
title: Scream VI
